summary: Completed comprehensive testing of admin-only prompt management system for Manuscript-TM DocWise. Fixed critical backend bug preventing regular users from using admin prompts for analysis. Fixed frontend bug where admin flag was not properly loaded after login. All admin-only features now working correctly - admin can manage prompts, regular users can only view/use admin prompts.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console for accessibility

passed_tests: Admin user info includes is_admin flag
Regular user info excludes admin flag
Admin can create prompts (403 forbidden for regular users)
Admin can update prompts (403 forbidden for regular users)
Admin can delete prompts (403 forbidden for regular users)
Admin can see their own prompts
Regular users can see admin's prompts for analysis
Regular users can analyze documents using admin prompts
Regular users can analyze text using admin prompts
Frontend admin badge displays correctly for admin user
Frontend admin badge NOT displayed for regular users
Admin user sees 'Manage Prompts' tab in dashboard
Regular users do NOT see 'Manage Prompts' tab
Admin user can access prompt management UI
Regular users can access analysis functionality with admin prompts
